import React , {useState} from 'react'; import './style.css'; import Button from '../../components/Button'; function UserRegisterPage() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}); const handleChange = (event) => { const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setInputs(values => ({...values, [name]: value})) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(inputs); // TODO: Add AJAX Request here } return (
) } export default UserRegisterPage;
